Data Fields
pio_action_data_t Struct Reference
Stratify OS » Device Interface » Pin Input/Output (PIO)

Data struct for passing data to callbacks. More...

#include <pio.h>

Collaboration diagram for pio_action_data_t:

Detailed Description

This data structure is passed to interrupt callbacks to give information about what pins caused the interrupt.

Data Fields

uint32_t mask
 Mask of pin(s) that caused interrupt.
